law.catch_line: Grounds for placement on probation, reprimand, refusal to issue or renew, revocation, or suspension of license.
law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 90, sec. 8, effective July 15, 2014. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 291, sec. 9, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 146, sec. 4, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 287, sec. 11.
